nodes.text: A Transport License was a document that allowed an individual drive or pilot a transport. One was given it by passing their Pilots Test. Ciption Lingsnot planned on getting his Transport License during Conception Day.

Transport License was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
